patthana1.19:1.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—paccuppannā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana1.19:2.1_0: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ …pe… paccavekkhati,
patthana1.19:2.1_3: Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.19:2.1_7: Atītaṁ cakkhuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.19:2.1_8: Atītaṁ sotaṁ …pe… ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … atīte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati,
patthana1.19:2.1_12: Atītā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa,
patthana1.19:3.1_0: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—anāgataṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ … anāgate khandhe aniccato …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.19:4.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— paccuppannaṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … paccuppanne khandhe aniccato …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati,
patthana1.19:4.1_3: rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… paccuppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa,
patthana1.19:5.1_0: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:5.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā …pe… pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati,
patthana1.19:5.1_2: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati.
patthana1.19:5.1_3: Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.19:5.1_5: Atītaṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … atīte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana1.19:5.1_6: taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.19:6.1_0: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:6.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—anāgataṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ … anāgate khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana1.19:6.1_2: taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.19:7.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.19:7.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—paccuppannaṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ … paccuppanne khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana1.19:7.1_2: taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.19:7.1_3: **Sahajātādhipati**—paccuppannādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:8.1_0: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā atītā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ paccuppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:8.1_1: Anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa … gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa … maggo phalassa … phalaṁ phalassa … anulomaṁ phalasamāpattiyā … nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:9.1_0: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo. (Anantarasadisaṁ.)
patthana1.19:10.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana1.19:11.1_0: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.19:11.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—atītaṁ saddhaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti, jhānaṁ uppādeti,
patthana1.19:11.1_2: vipassanaṁ … maggaṁ … abhiññaṁ … samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.19:11.1_3: Atītaṁ sīlaṁ …pe… paññaṁ … rāgaṁ …pe… patthanaṁ … kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti sīlaṁ samādiyati,
patthana1.19:11.1_5: pāṇaṁ hanati …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati. Atītā saddhā …pe… paññā, rāgo …pe… patthanā,
patthana1.19:11.1_6: kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ … paccuppannāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya,
patthana1.19:12.1_0: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.19:12.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—anāgataṁ cakkhusampadaṁ patthayamāno …pe… sotasampadaṁ … ghānasampadaṁ jivhāsampadaṁ … kāyasampadaṁ … vaṇṇasampadaṁ … saddasampadaṁ … gandhasampadaṁ … rasasampadaṁ … phoṭṭhabbasampadaṁ … patthayamāno …pe… anāgate khandhe patthayamāno dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati,
patthana1.19:12.1_2: uposathakammaṁ … anāgatā cakkhusampadā …pe… vaṇṇasampadā …pe… phoṭṭhabbasampadā … anāgatā khandhā paccuppannāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa,
patthana1.19:13.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.19:13.1_2: vipassanaṁ …pe… paccuppannaṁ bhojanaṁ senāsanaṁ upanissāya jhānaṁ uppādeti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti.
patthana1.19:13.1_3: Paccuppannaṁ utu … bhojanaṁ … senāsanaṁ paccuppannāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya kāyikassa …pe… phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:14.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana1.19:14.1_4: rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:14.1_5: **Vatthupurejātaṁ**—cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa … vatthu paccuppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:15.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo— pacchājātā paccuppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:16.1_0: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā atītā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ paccuppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:16.1_1: Anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa … gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:17.1_0: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:17.1_1: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—atītā cetanā paccuppannānaṁ vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:18.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— paccuppannā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:18.1_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccuppannā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:19.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko paccuppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… khandhā vatthussa vipākapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:20.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.19:20.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccuppannā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo,
patthana1.19:20.1_5: **Purejātaṁ**—cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa … vatthu paccuppannānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:20.1_6: **Pacchājātā**—paccuppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:21.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (Uppannattike atthisadisaṁ.)
patthana1.19:22.1_0: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:23.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa avigatapaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.19:24.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ,
patthana1.19:24.1_1: sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye ekaṁ, upanissaye tīṇi,
patthana1.19:24.1_2: purejāte pacchājāte āsevane ekaṁ, kamme dve,
patthana1.19:24.1_3: vipāke āhāre ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.19:26.1_0: Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:27.1_0: Anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:28.1_0: Paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.19:29.1_0: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi,
patthana1.19:29.1_1: naanantare tīṇi …pe… nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, noatthiyā dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi, noavigate dve. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.19:31.1_1: naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye …pe… nasampayutte navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate ekaṁ. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.19:33.1_1: anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye ekaṁ, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte ekaṁ,
patthana1.19:33.1_3: vipāke ekaṁ (imesu padesu ekaṁyeva), avigate ekaṁ. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
